statements: UPDATE monthly_financial_statements SET total_income = 5000 WHERE user_id = 1 AND month_year = '2022-01-01';
UPDATE monthly_financial_statements SET total_expenses = 3000 WHERE user_id = 2 AND month_year = '2022-03-01';
UPDATE monthly_financial_statements SET net_profit = total_income - total_expenses WHERE user_id = 3 AND month_year = '2022-02-01';
UPDATE monthly_financial_statements SET total_income = total_income * 1.05 WHERE user_id = 1 AND month_year = '2022-01-01';
UPDATE monthly_financial_statements SET total_expenses = total_expenses * 1.1, net_profit = total_income - total_expenses WHERE user_id = 2 AND month_year = '2022-02-01';

UPDATE monthly_financial_statements SET total_income = total_income * 1.03, total_expenses = total_expenses * 1.05, net_profit = total_income - total_expenses WHERE user_id = 3 AND month_year = '2022-03-01';
UPDATE monthly_statements SET income = 5000 WHERE user_id = '11b7c0f6-0d2e-4b6f-a506-500d1b351f1b' AND month = '2022-01-01';

UPDATE monthly_statements SET expenses = expenses - 200 WHERE user_id = 'abc123' AND month = '2022-04-01';

UPDATE expenses SET description = 'Updated expense description' WHERE user_id = '1ab25fa5-45f9-4914-866c-85c6d73e208b' AND expense_date < '2022-07-01';
